# Single File Docs

> Documentation for Single File Docs.

- [Create a single file for application deployment](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/deploying/single-file/overview.md): Learn what single file application is and why you should consider using this application deployment model.

## Subtopics

- [Warnings Docs](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/deploying/single-file/warnings/llms.txt): 6 topics; Warnings Docs documentation and reference.
